works.complaint:
You can see by the wording in the link, that this  
person is horribly racist, and in this one blog, has three separate posts 

slandering and belittling my name, and horribly racialized the First  
Nations people's experience in residential school.

All I did, was accept an interview, where I was asked to answer questions 

about the residential school experience.  Somehow he found this article
and  
thoroughly attacks me personally, my people as a whole, and the writer.

I tried to clarify by replying, stating that i attacked no one, but this  

set him off all over again, and he created two more posts, attacking
again.

Please please help!
